title: Yo. Riot enough with the mastery censoring
body:
I tried to type "Mordekaiser" and it censored dek.

Tried to type "Full Tank" but It censored the fu in full.

I get what you're trying to do, but this is stupid and more than moderately annoying.

replies.body: Hey, this is an oops on our part! Our profanity filter is really Doing Things at the moment, but we're gonna roll it back to be less aggressive. No ETA yet, but you should be able to name mastery pages normally soon.
https://media.tenor.com/images/74f97ccb8e36bf3b70dcbf5812260354/tenor.gif

#ASS ASS SINS

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/320/984/651.jpg
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gb0WJ-JQJYI
words cannot describe what i just watched
It's an ass ass in going ass ass out.
[The poros know what's up!](http://i.imgur.com/wP7Y2yu.gif)

Dude... DUDE!

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/001/146/898/c9c.jpg

Think of the ~~children~~ ~~women~~ minions!
https://youtu.be/ZZ5LpwO-An4?t=31

Did I just read:

>https://theinsightfulpanda.files.wordpress.com/2015/05/age-of-ultron-captain-america-language.jpg

??

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uSEXgQ58AoM

On a serious note, I don't need a profanity filter - as a mature adult (unless this game is "PG-32"-rated), I can take it. 
You can add a disable option, you know. Leave it on by default, but let the grown-ups decide for themselves.

And on that note, I still cannot set "DT Lulu recall plz" as status message, because the useless thing picks up _DT_ as offensive.
_Not that I know how "DT" is offensive..._

_It's alistardung like this that causes my wallet to keep its legs closed._

Your name was the word 'park' in it. In Dalek tongue that is a curse word. I demand that for all Dalek kind you add that word to the profane word list.

On behalf of all Daleks, your name has offended us greatly.

######'Doctor' is another curse word. Please exterminate that word. Thank you.
Hey, quick question, Why can't I name my rune page Lesbian Fish status but I can name it Gay Fish status?
Women might get offended and offending women is bad, offending men is ok though.

Insulting against women, I'd wager. 
Demanding equality, but also demanding special rights.

I'd suggest not going that way with the profanity filter.

I played a game which went that path - it's called Crossfire, you may know it as THE top grossing F2P title of 2013 - and it was literally and I mean "literally" impossible to write a full, non-vulgar sentence in English without something getting ***'d away.

You basically had to resort to using numbers and special characters to get the message across and even that wasn't enough in most cases.
What about usernames? I had an account "shadow assault" and it renamed me.

> [{quoted}](name=Off The Heezy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TlVGM8Vm,comment-id=00050011,timestamp=2017-08-03T04:38:47.486+0000)
>
> What about usernames? I had an account "shadow assault" and it renamed me.

Hey was this on the live NA server? or PBE? And it just happened on your most recent login? If you took screenshots or anything, that would be really helpful. Trying to figure out why this happened to you!

> [{quoted}](name=Off The Heezy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TlVGM8Vm,comment-id=00050011,timestamp=2017-08-03T04:38:47.486+0000)
>
> What about usernames? I had an account "shadow assault" and it renamed me.

This one I'm actually not sure on - I don't think this bug should have an effect on summoner names. I'll see if I can figure that out!
You should make filters that filter "LUL" and "xD" in client and in game chats forever. No one should witness those things anymore.
gg ez
soraka too.
Will that fix the strange censorship happening in german language as well? Would be great....
Go to your settings while in a game and turn off chat filter
My filter is off. I made a mastery page called "Basic Soraka". They censored the "rak"
Well, it's polish word for cancer, so that may be it (still dunno if that's enough to be censored).
If we're going to censor everything in the English language that is similar to swear words/offensive words in other languages, shit's gonna get unreadable really damn fast.

*** ***** *** ** * ** *** ******* ***** ***** ** ***** *** **** ** Cho OP.


Basically the average chat log as seen in game...

It actually is.
A long time ago when I was lurking through LoL files I found a... text file with all censored words.

"Rak" was among them.

I found that file too once. But after reading a bit, I decided I had ever heard about 15% tops of all those words.
The rest I didn't even know existed.

> [{quoted}](name=MEGÁDETH,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TlVGM8Vm,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-07-27T16:05:33.289+0000)
>
> My filter is off. I made a mastery page called "Basic Soraka". They censored the "rak"

It's bugged. Turn it on and it will be off. Trust me

>It's bugged.

Waat!? Their precious new and oh-so shiny, built from the ground-up League client is bugged? Nah, that can't be...

Surely they made the new client less 

http://natashaskitchen.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/Spaghetti-and-Meatballs-Recipe-3-600x400.jpg

...than the old one, else the new one was a complete waste of time.

Let's face it.

They wanted to push out the new shiny as soon as possible.
If they were to wait until it was working correctly and with all features the old one had plus those they promised, we'd die of old age most likely.

Or witness the release of Half Life 3.
That's not it at all. I don't make the game censor things for me. I'm a big boy.
Why on earth are they censoring your own _personal_ mastery pages? No one else see's them but you, it's pretty ridiculous if you ask me. Why can't I call my pages what I want?
You can see other peoples' mastery pages both via API (third-party websites) and by right-clicking their name and clicking "view profile".

That's 3rd party though. I don't think people are gonna get upset if they check my mastery pages and ones called MEGA ASS POUNDING or something like that. Then again this is 2017 so actually they might get triggered.

>Then again this is 2017 so actually they might get triggered. 

I find the truth in this statement concerning indeed.

In before your name is censored: "s-WEED-ishgunner".
_"Gunner" is okay - they are american - but drugs and suggestions of a boob is not. Logic._
"RAK" in SORAKA is censored as well.

"Heil" is in Shield so my warden-style page turned into S****d.  Why is Heil even censored?  I know it's commonly associated with a certain hateful historical figure but come on it's literally just the german word for praise and is not hateful at all without context.  Literally any word can be made profane with those standards.
"hiel" not "heil".
You probably just misspelled Shield.
Woops yeah you're right!  But I still stand by my point!
Haha yeah no I'm totally with you though, the censorship has gone off the reservation

This reminds me of an "issue" from Everquest [Riot Tryndamere and Ryze could corroborate this if they ever read the boards].

There was a mob called a "Cockatrice", mostly in the Kunark continent but especially in The Overthere.... Sony tried to implement forced censorship so if you had an incoming message, or %target (%t) of the mob it would be like "There is an incoming 'a stonegazer @#*$&atrice' "...

Sony was so dumb that they censored their own game.

Have you played Crossfire?

The profanity filter was so "elaborate" you couldn't even say fucking "hello".
People were basically speaking with numbers and special characters.

The biggest insult was that disabled "disable profanity filter" box in settings which was there from the day I installed the game in like 2010 or something and was still like that in 2017 when I reinstalled it to see how or if it changed.
surprisingly it doesn't censor cKYSiopeia whenever it didn't let me type "Cass"
Yeah, I've heard instances of "Support" being censored and I've had an issue where the "Cai" in Caitlyn was censored. I feel like it's a bug TBH.
The word "Support" is censored..

The word "rito" is censored.

Edit: Apparently "riot" is an offensive word. Fair enough
